results.title: Efficacy of empagliflozin for weight and glycemic control of a patient with Prader-Willi syndrome, systemic lymphedema and extreme obesity: a case report
results.text_hl: Taken together, these findings indicate @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ drug as a suitable approach is an add-on drug to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for treating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Prader_Willi_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011218 @@@PWS@@@, although the results of our single case report should be extrapolated with caution.

citations.NLM: Farinha JB, Weinert LS, Costa LP, Costa MZ, de Peres PP, Lorea CF. Efficacy of empagliflozin for weight and glycemic control of a patient with Prader-Willi syndrome, systemic lymphedema and extreme obesity: a case report Int J Diabetes Dev Ctries. 2022 Oct;42(4):787-790. results.title: [Obesity treatment with liraglutide in a patient with Prader-Willi syndrome: a case report].
results.text_hl: ...BACKGROUND: @<m>DISEASE_Prader_Willi_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011218 @@@Prader-Willi syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Prader_Willi_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011218 @@@PWS@@@) is a major cause of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@syndromic obesity@@@, caused by deletions on chromosome 15q11-q13.

citations.NLM: Cadena-Obando DA, Molina-Ayala MA, Ferreira-Hermosillo A. [Obesity treatment with liraglutide in a patient with Prader-Willi syndrome: a case report]. Nutr Hosp. 2018 May 21;35(3):743-746. PMID: 29974787
